name: Fever (Official Music Video)
lyrics:
[00:32.92]Before you came around, I was doing just fine
[00:37.18]Usually, usually, usually, I don't pay no mind
[00:40.66]And when it came down, I was looking in your eyes
[00:44.91]Suddenly, suddenly, suddenly I can feel it inside
[00:49.19]I've got a fever, so can you check?
[00:53.18]Hand on my forehead, kiss my neck
[00:57.41]And when you touch me, baby, I turn red
[01:01.43]I've got a fever, so can you check?
[01:10.19]Peut-être qu'avec du temps, ça partira
[01:13.92]Et pourtant, et pourtant, et pourtant, je ne m'y vois pas
[01:17.91]Comme un médicament, moi, je suis rien sans toi
[01:22.16]Et je sais que, je sais que jе perds du temps dans tes bras
[01:26.66]I'vе got a fever, so can you check?
[01:30.43]Hand on my forehead, kiss my neck
[01:34.95]And when you touch me, baby, I turn red
[01:38.93]I've got a fever, so can you check?
[01:43.42]Car dans mes yeux, ça se voit
[01:45.90]La fièvre dans mes yeux, oui, ça se voit
[01:49.66]Mon cœur se serre, j'ai du feu dans la voix
[01:52.16]Le plus souvent, c'est quand je pense à toi
[01:57.67]I've got a fever, can you check?
[02:01.69]Hand on my forehead, kiss my neck
[02:05.69]And when you touch me, baby, I turn red (I turn red)
[02:09.66]I've got a fever, so can you check? (Amour en fièvre)
[02:48.16]Tell me what you wanna do right now
[02:50.68]Tell me what you wanna do right now (Amour en fièvre)
[02:52.42]Tell me what you wanna do right now
[02:54.67]'Cause I don't really wanna cool it down (Amour en fièvre)
[02:56.66]Tell me what you wanna do right now
[02:58.69]Tell me what you wanna do right now (Amour en fièvre)
[03:00.69]Tell me what you wanna do right now
[03:02.42]'Cause I don't really wanna cool it down
[03:04.43]Car dans mes yeux, ça se voit (Amour en fièvre)
[03:09.41]La fièvre dans les yeux, oui, ça se voit (Amour en fièvre)
[03:12.67]Mon cœur se serre, j'ai du feu dans la voix (Amour en fièvre)
[03:17.20]Le plus souvent, c'est quand je pense à toi (Amour en fièvre)

name: Alice
lyrics:
[00:01.33]My name isn't Alice
[00:05.32]But I'll keep looking, I'll keep looking for Wonderland
[00:09.20]My name isn't Alice
[00:12.87]But I'll keep looking, I'll keep looking for Wonderland, Wonderland
[00:17.54]Ah, ah, ah, ah
[00:20.04]Ah, ah, ah, ah (Ah)
[00:23.10]Set me free (Ah-ah-ah)
[00:25.60]Ah, ah, ah, ah
[00:27.52]Ah, ah, ah, ah (Ah)
[00:30.33]Set me free (Ah-ah-ah)
[00:33.12]Could you pull me out of this alive? (Ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah)
[00:41.19]Where's my body? I'm stuck in my mind (Ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah)
[00:49.05](Oh ma-ma-ma, oh ma-ma-ma)
[00:50.72]I'm tired of screaming
[00:52.36](Oh-ma-ma-ma, oh-ma-ma-ma)
[00:55.11]At the top of my lungs
[00:56.78](Oh m-mother, oh m-mother)
[00:58.75]I'm in the hole, I'm falling down, down
[01:01.56]So down, down
[01:03.85]My name isn't Alice
[01:07.52]But I'll keep looking, I'll keep looking for Wonderland
[01:11.76]My name isn't Alice
[01:15.18]But I'll keep looking, I'll keep looking for Wonderland, Wonderland
[01:19.71]Take me home
[01:23.14]Take me to Wonderland, Wonderland
[01:27.40]Take me home
[01:31.09]Take me to Wonderland, Wonderland
[01:35.81]Sick and tired of waking up
[01:37.52]Screaming at the top of my lungs
[01:39.45]Think I might've just left myself behind
[01:41.33]Maestro, play me your symphony
[01:45.23]I will listen to anything
[01:47.17]Take me on a trip, DJ, free my mind
[01:50.53]My name isn't Alice
[01:54.19]But I'll keep looking, I'll keep looking for Wonderland
[01:58.08]My name isn't Alice
[02:01.98]But I'll keep looking, I'll keep looking for Wonderland, Wonderland
[02:06.53]Take me home
[02:09.97]Take me to Wonderland, Wonderland
[02:14.15]Take me home
[02:17.93]Take me to Wonderland, Wonderland
[02:21.83]Take me home
[02:25.49]Take me to Wonderland, Wonderland
[02:29.71]Take me home
[02:33.36]Take me to Wonderland, Wonderland
[02:38.86]Ah, ah, ah, ah
[02:40.53]Ah, ah, ah, ah (Ah)
[02:42.78]Set me free (Ah-ah-ah)
[02:46.17]Ah, ah, ah, ah
[02:48.14]Ah, ah, ah, ah (Ah)
[02:51.25]Set me free (Ah-ah-ah)
